name: RPG Quest IV
description:
RPG Quest IV is the new modernized text game!

Wield the Ancient Weapon to conquer your foes!

Fight, bandits, animals and other creatures while you prepare against your fight against Dark Lord W!

Level up, and power up your Ancient Weapon with new runes to unlock new attacks!

Enter the World of the Past Today!
